name: Sans Souci Pass: The Whispering Stones
description: Fog at Sans Souci Pass tastes of cold iron; seven whisper-stones pricked with chalk hide an arrow beneath Naia's rubbing while two lanterns—one sputtering, one steady—halo three dew-slick ferns. Chains scrape uphill as Maliya salts her tongue and the trio slips along the 70° thread of roots.
riddle: Seven stones murmur, two flames answer, three fronds nod—let the arrow they conceal point you onward.
